cards.name: Better
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Upgrade all cards in your hand.
Add Faster to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Do it Faster
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Next turn, gain [E] [E]
Apply Slow to ALL enemies.
Add Makes us Stronger to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Faster
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Apply Slow to an enemy.
Add Stronger to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Make it Better
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Upgrade all cards in your hand.
This turn, whenever you draw a card, upgrade it.
Add Do it Faster to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Makes us Stronger
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 6 Strength.
Gain 6 Strength at the start of your turn.

cards.name: One Strike
cards.description:
Kill a non-boss enemy.
Fleeting.

cards.name: One Strike Plus Ultra
cards.description:
Kill a non-boss enemy.
Realize you wasted an upgrade.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Stronger
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 4 Strength at the start of your turn.

cards.name: Fear
cards.description:
Add 2 Angers to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fear+
cards.description:
Add 2 upgraded Angers to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Collector's Strike
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
jedi:Collective 3.

cards.name: Collector's Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
jedi:Collective 4.

cards.name: Controlled Anger
cards.description:
Add 2 Angers to your hand.
Whenever you play an Anger, Exhaust it.

cards.name: Controlled Anger+
cards.description:
Add 2 Upgraded Angers to your hand.
Whenever you play an Anger, Exhaust it.

cards.name: Hate
cards.description:
Exhaust all Angers in your discard pile and deal 5 damage for each.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hate+
cards.description: Exhaust all Angers in your discard pile and deal 7 damage for each.

cards.name: Makeshift Sword
cards.description: Whenever a card is created during combat, deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Makeshift Sword+
cards.description: Whenever a card is created during combat, deal 7 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Suffering
cards.description:
For each Attack Exhausted, deal 2 damage to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Suffering+
cards.description:
For each Attack Exhausted, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bloody Hammer
cards.description:
Permanently upgrade a card in your hand.
Lose 6 HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bloody Hammer+
cards.description:
Permanently upgrade any number of cards in your hand and
Lose 6 HP for each.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Harder
cards.description:
Gain 2 Plated Armor.
Add Better to your hand.

cards.name: Strikeing Strike
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Play a random Strike on the same enemy.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Strikeing Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Play a random upgraded Strike on the same enemy.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Unlimited Power
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Return this card to hand jedi:Improved and Ethereal.

cards.name: Unlimited Power+
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Return this card to hand jedi:Improved.

cards.name: Work it Harder
cards.description:
Gain 2 Metallicize.
Gain 2 Plated Armor.
Add Make it Better to your hand.

cards.name: Pocket Poison
cards.description: Apply 3 Poison.

cards.name: Pocket Poison+
cards.description:
Apply 3 Poison.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Acid Rain
cards.description: Apply 2 Poison for each card discarded this turn.

cards.name: Acid Rain+
cards.description: Apply 3 Poison for each card discarded this turn.

cards.name: Collector's Venom
cards.description:
Apply 2 Poison.
jedi:Collective 2.

cards.name: Collector's Venom+
cards.description:
Apply 2 Poison.
jedi:Collective 3.

cards.name: Hat Trick
cards.description:
Draw ALL Shivs and
increase damage dealt by Shivs by 1 for each Shiv drawn.

cards.name: Hat Trick+
cards.description:
Draw ALL Shivs and
increase damage dealt by Shivs by 1 for each Shiv drawn.

cards.name: Poison Ivy
cards.description: Whenever you attack a Poisoned enemy with a non-Shiv card, add 1 Shiv to your hand.

cards.name: Poison Ivy+
cards.description:
Innate.
Whenever you attack a Poisoned enemy with a non-Shiv card, add 1 Shiv to your hand.

cards.name: Unstable Fumes
cards.description:
Apply 2 Poison.
If this card is discarded from your hand, apply 4 Poison to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Unstable Fumes+
cards.description:
Apply 4 Poison.
If this card is discarded from your hand, apply 6 Poison to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Brewing Poison
cards.description:
Apply 3 Poison.
Exhaust.
Whenever you draw this card, increase its Poison by 3.
Whenever you discard this card, double its Poison.

cards.name: Brewing Poison+
cards.description:
Apply 3 Poison.
Exhaust.
Whenever you draw this card, increase its Poison by 4.
Whenever you discard this card, double its Poison.

cards.name: Storm of Toxin
cards.description:
Discard your hand.
Apply 3 Poison for each card discarded.

cards.name: Storm of Toxin+
cards.description:
Discard any number of cards.
Apply 4 Poison for each card discarded.

cards.name: Study Poison
cards.description: Choose 1 of 3 random Poison-related cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.

cards.name: Study Poison+
cards.description: Choose 1 of 3 random Poison-related cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Study Shivs
cards.description: Choose 1 of 3 random Shivs-related cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.

cards.name: Study Shivs+
cards.description: Choose 1 of 3 random Shivs-related cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: DC
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
Deals 3 additional damage for each Lightning.
Exhaust.

cards.name: DC+
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
Deals 3 additional damage for each Lightning.
Exhaust.Retain.

cards.name: Flash Freeze
cards.description:
Retain.
Channel 1 Frost and
trigger its passive effect.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Flash Freeze+
cards.description:
Retain.
Channel 1 Frost and
trigger its passive effect 2 times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: AC
cards.description:
Channel 1 Lightning.
Add DC into your hand.

cards.name: AC+
cards.description:
Channel 2 Lightning.
Add DC into your hand.

cards.name: Block-On
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
Apply 1 Lock-On to each enemy that intends to attack.

cards.name: Block-On+
cards.description:
Gain 9 Block.
Apply 2 Lock-On to each enemy that intends to attack.

cards.name: Burst Frost
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Gain additional Block equal to your Focus.

cards.name: Burst Frost+
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.
Gain additional Block equal to your Focus times 2.

cards.name: Burst Lightning
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Deals additional damage equal to your Focus.
Is affected by Electrodynamics.

cards.name: Burst Lightning+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Deals additional damage equal to your Focus times 2.
Is affected by Electrodynamics.

cards.name: Entomb
cards.description:
Gain 9 Block.
Apply 2 Weak.
Add 2 Flash Freezes into your hand.

cards.name: Entomb+
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
Apply 2 Weak.
Add 2 Flash Freezes+ into your hand.

cards.name: Hex
cards.description:
Apply 1 Lock-On.
Apply 1 Vulnerable.
Apply 1 Weak.

cards.name: Hex+
cards.description:
Apply 2 Lock-On.
Apply 2 Vulnerable.
Apply 2 Weak.

cards.name: Lock'N'Load
cards.description:
Apply 2 Lock-On.
Channel 2 Lightning.

cards.name: Lock'N'Load+
cards.description:
Apply 3 Lock-On.
Channel 3 Lightning.

cards.name: Mark of Death
cards.description:
Apply 99 Lock-On.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Mark of Death+
cards.description:
Apply 99 Lock-On.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Overflow
cards.description: If you have no empty Orb slots, gain 1 Orb slot.

cards.name: Overflow+
cards.description:
If you have no empty Orb slots, gain 1 Orb slot.
Otherwise, Channel 1 random Orb.

cards.name: Reiji
cards.description:
innate.
Apply 3 Lock-On.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Reiji+
cards.description:
Innate.
Apply 3 Lock-On.

Exhaust.

cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Draw 2 cards
that cost 0.

cards.name: Scrape+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Draw 3 cards
that cost 0.

cards.name: Sharpshooter
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
If enemy has Lock-On, gain [E] and draw a card.

cards.name: Sharpshooter+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
If enemy has Lock-On, gain [E] and draw a card.

cards.name: Spot Bugs
cards.description: If the enemy intends to buff, gain 1 Orb slot.

cards.name: Spot Bugs+
cards.description: If the enemy intends to buff or doesn't intend to attack, gain 1 Orb slot.

cards.name: Bruteforce
cards.description:
Evoke your rightmost Lightning Orb till it hits selected enemy 3 times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bruteforce+
cards.description:
Evoke your rightmost Lightning Orb till it hits selected enemy 4 times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Burst Dark
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Whenever you Evoke an Orb with this card in hand, increase its damage by 5 until played.

cards.name: Burst Dark+
cards.description:
Retain.
Deal 6 damage.
Whenever you Evoke an Orb with this card in hand, increase its damage by 5 until played.

cards.name: Darkness Call
cards.description:
Apply 1 Lock-On to an enemy with lowest HP.
Evoke your rightmost Dark Orb.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Darkness Call+
cards.description:
Apply 1 Lock-On to an enemy with lowest HP.
Evoke your rightmost Dark Orb.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Firewall
cards.description:
When a Status card is created,
Exhaust it.

cards.description:

When a Status card is created,
Exhaust it.

cards.description:
For each non-Lightning orb Channeled this combat, Channel 1 Lightning.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Gathering Storm+
cards.description:
For each non-Lightning orb Channeled this combat, Channel 1 Lightning.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Meditation
cards.description:
At the end of your turn, gain 1 Focus.

cards.name: Meditation+
cards.description:
At the end of your turn, gain 2 Focus.
Lose ALL Focus whenever you lose HP.

cards.name: Ready, Aim, Fire
cards.description:

Exhaust.

cards.name: Ready, Aim, Fire+
cards.description:

Evoke ALL orbs.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Future Shield
cards.description: Gain 10 Block when played or Scried.

cards.name: Future Shield+
cards.description: Gain 13 Block when played or Scried.

cards.name: Overlook
cards.description:
Scry 2.
If you discarded an Attack, enter Wrath.
Otherwise, enter Calm.

cards.name: Overlook+
cards.description:
Scry 3.
If you discarded an Attack, enter Wrath.

cards.name: Battle Thirst
cards.description:
Unplayable.
While in your deck, you have to enter combat rooms whenever you can.

cards.name: Frostbite
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Whenever this card is drawn, lose 3 Strength this turn.

cards.name: Missplay
cards.description:
Unplayable.
When drawn, plays a random card in hand.

cards.name: The Dog
cards.description:
Unplayable. Retain.
Cannot be removed from your hand.

relics.name: Blood Pack
relics.description:
When you would lose HP from non-Attack damage, lose 1 less.
Cannot reduce below 1.
relics.flavorText: This relic is deprecated.

relics.name: Endoplasm
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. The first time you lose HP each round, lose 50 Gold. Whenever you lose HP outside of combat, lose 50 Gold.
relics.flavorText: This relic is deprecated.

relics.name: Lead-Lined Bottle
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card. Start each combat with this card at the bottom of your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: This relic is deprecated.

relics.name: Strike Manual
relics.description: All Strikes deal 4 additional damage.
relics.flavorText: This relic is deprecated.

relics.name: Crown of Simplicity
relics.description: First Basic card each turn is played twice.
relics.flavorText: An extremely simple crown for an extremely simple purpose.

relics.name: Fennex Feather
relics.description: The first time a card is created each combat, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: Fennex, a legendary creature of the desert. Mischievous and immortal, fluffy and feathery...

relics.name: Laser Pointer
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Lock-On to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Why is it a pointer if it targets everyone?

relics.name: Portable Tent
relics.description: You can now encounter Rest sites in ? rooms.
relics.flavorText: Seems to be made of snecko skin, doused in slime goop. Offers long-term restorative effects.

relics.name: Rubber Sling
relics.description: First time each turn when you discard a card, draw a card.
relics.flavorText: I thought they don't use rubber in yoyo?

relics.name: Shrink Ray
relics.description: Non-boss enemies have 10% less HP.
relics.flavorText: An evil mastermind has once tried to steal a satellite with this very relic...

relics.name: Star Aurum
relics.description: If you've created a card during your turn, gain 8 Block at the end of it.
relics.flavorText: Oh? You're approaching me? Instead of running away?

relics.name: Angry Mask
relics.description: Whenever you spend any Gold at a shop, start the next combat with 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Is this what they call "Aggressive marketing"?

relics.name: Archwizard's Hat
relics.description: Whenever an Attack that costs 1 or more uses all of your current energy, increase its damage by 25%.
relics.flavorText: Bakuretsu, bakuretsu, la la la...

relics.name: Bottled Fury
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card. Whenever an enemy dies, Fetch this card from anywhere.
relics.flavorText: Have you heard the tale of an alien who escaped prison with nothing but a sword in his hand?

relics.name: Catwich
relics.description: The first unupgraded card you discard each turn is Upgraded.
relics.flavorText: Infinite energy here we go.

relics.name: Ghost Blades
relics.description: Shivs ignore enemy Block.
relics.flavorText: There's something strange... In the neighbourhood...

relics.name: Heavy Jacket
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Plated Armor for every 2 relics you have.
relics.flavorText: That's a lot of pockets for a single jacket.

relics.name: Iron Blood
relics.description: Whenever you would lose HP, take that much damage instead.
relics.flavorText: "I am the bone of my sword..."

relics.name: Paper Faux
relics.description: Enemies with Lock-On take 75% more damage rather than 50%.
relics.flavorText: What does it say?

relics.name: Pinwheel
relics.description: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Seems to be spinning despite complete lack of wind.

relics.name: Scrap Metal
relics.description: Shivs deal 1 additional damage for each Shiv played during the turn.
relics.flavorText: Nothing should go to waste.

relics.name: Sprinkler
relics.description: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, apply 3 Poison to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Taking care of those nasty insects has never been so easy!

relics.name: Superconductor
relics.description: For every 10 Orbs Channeled, trigger passive effect of ALL Orbs.
relics.flavorText: You can almost hear orbs going round and round...

relics.name: Tarot deck
relics.description:
The first time you create a card during combat:
If it's an Attack - gain 2 Strength.
If it's a Skill - gain 2 Dexterity.
If it's a Power - heal 4 HP.
If it's a Status - Exhaust it and all future Status cards this turn.
If it's a Curse - raise your Max HP by 2.
relics.flavorText: They say drawing from this deck reads your fate. Or does it determine it?

relics.name: First Aid Kit
relics.description: Whenever you take unblocked attack damage, gain 2 Regen.
relics.flavorText: Do you really need a bandage for every byrd peck?

relics.name: Gremlin Knob
relics.description: Whenever you play a Skill, gain 1 Strength until the end of your turn.
relics.flavorText: If I hear ONE MORE knock-knock joke...

relics.name: Kaleidoscope
relics.description: Start each combat with Strength equal to unique card colors in your deck.
relics.flavorText: It seems to be lacking its main shard...

relics.name: Matchstick
relics.description:
Right click during combat to activate.
Usable once per combat.
Gain [E] [E] .
relics.flavorText: The match is struck. A blazing star is born!

relics.name: Paint Brush
relics.description:
Right click during combat to activate.
Usable once per combat.
Add a copy of last card created into your hand.
relics.flavorText: Sometimes, you draw a masterpiece. Sometimes, there's nothing but a daze.

relics.name: Purple Fairy
relics.description: Whenever you Smith a card, heal HP depending on card rarity.
relics.flavorText: Mai waifu.

relics.name: Command
relics.description: Instead of random you always choose which relic to obtain.
relics.flavorText: There is no rain inside the Spire.

relics.name: Command (boss)
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose and obtain any boss relic.
relics.flavorText: ASSUMING DIRECT CONTROL

relics.name: Command (common)
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose and obtain any common relic.
relics.flavorText: ASSUMING DIRECT CONTROL

relics.name: Command (rare)
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose and obtain any rare relic.
relics.flavorText: ASSUMING DIRECT CONTROL

relics.name: Command (shop)
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose and obtain any shop relic.
relics.flavorText: ASSUMING DIRECT CONTROL

relics.name: Command (uncommon)
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose and obtain any uncommon relic.
relics.flavorText: ASSUMING DIRECT CONTROL

relics.name: Token of Glory
relics.description: Elites appear more often in future acts.
relics.flavorText: You're feeling an ominous presence...

relics.name: Token of Mystery
relics.description: ? rooms appear more often in future acts.

relics.name: Token of Serenity
relics.description: Rest sites appear more often in future acts.
relics.flavorText: Hush now, quiet now, it's time to lay your sleepy head...

relics.name: Token of Wealth
relics.description: Shops appear more often in future acts.
relics.flavorText: The price you pay.

relics.name: Zontanonomicon
relics.description: The first Skill played each turn that costs 2 or more is played twice.
relics.flavorText: You feel invigorated just by holding this Book of Living.

relics.name: Ballet Shoes
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn if you haven't played cards of same type in a row in last turn.
relics.flavorText: Dance, dance like your life depends on it!

relics.name: Battle Standard
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You have to enter combat rooms whenever you can.
relics.flavorText: To battle! Fight! Fight for your life!

relics.name: Byrd Bible
relics.description: The first time a card is created each turn, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: In the beginning was the Word. And the Word was "Ca-caw!"

relics.name: Hot Pepper
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Upon pickup, reduce your Max HP by 25%. Further Max HP increase effects are reduced by 50%
relics.flavorText: Not only it burns your mouth when you eat it, it also leaves a horrible aftertaste so that any food after it doesn't taste well.

relics.name: Paper Lyon
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn. When Vulnerable, take 75% more attack damage rather than 50%. When Weak, deal 40% less attack damage rather than 25%.
Synergy: Odd Mushroom
relics.flavorText: It may only be made of paper, yet it gives such an intimidating aura.

relics.name: Ash Lotus
relics.description: At the end of your turn, if you have no cards left in your hand, draw and discard piles, gain Block equal to the number of cards in your exhaust pile size plus 30 and deal that much damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Welcome home, Ashen Two...

relics.name: Crying Mask
relics.description:
The Merchant's card removal service can now be purchased twice per shop for the same price.
Synergy: Smiling Mask
relics.flavorText: Mask worn by the Merchant of the past... Or is it of the future?

relics.name: Fake Mustache
relics.description: When spending Gold at the shop, heal 5 HP. Heal 10 HP upon pickup.
relics.flavorText: A familiar face?

relics.name: Ominous Loan Note
relics.description: Upon pickup receive a large sum of gold. All gold gained, with interest, will go toward paying off this debt.
relics.flavorText: You pay for your greed.

relics.name: Wind-up Box
relics.description: Increases effectiveness of all time-based relics.
relics.flavorText: Like clockwork.

potions.name: Striking Potion
potions.description: Choose 1 of 3 random cards containing "Strike" to add to your hand, it costs 0 this turn.

potions.name: Energy drink
potions.description: You may ignore paths when choosing the next room to travel to once.

potions.name: Hoard Potion
potions.description: Add all cards from current card reward screen to your deck.

potions.name: Mystery Potion
potions.description:
The next room you can go to, other than bosses, becomes a ? room.
Cannot be used in The Ending.

keywords.name: Collective
keywords.description: Increase the value of a card in your deck with the same name by the Collective amount on it, instead of obtaining this card. You are more likely to find this card in future card rewards the higher the value is.

keywords.name: Constriction
keywords.description: Deals damage at the end of creature's turn. If the enemy is constricted, it will do its move first and then take damage from constriction.

keywords.name: Jedi:chaos
keywords.description: Randomizes cost and effects of certain cards when drawn.
